Science Mom

I make educational videos and activities for kids of all ages.

I'm Jenny Ballif, a.k.a Science Mom. I create content for kids to learn science and math. My mission in life is to make the world a better place by bringing science to every home and by providing engaging lessons to educators. If you'd like to support my work, please subscribe to the Science Mom youtube channel and consider becoming a patron on Patreon. Hover over the image below to view some of my patrons.
